NGSymposium extends abstract submission!

Abstract submission deadline for Virtual NGSymposium was extended to 27.08.2020. We encourage all members of our growing community to share their research during this event.

If you want to present your work visit Virtual NGsymposium page and register. Then, join us on Thursday, 24th and Friday, 25th September 2020 on YouTube!</b> Everybody is welcome!
